name: Knitted boy elf hat blue and brown stripes
description:
The baby boy knitted elf hat in the blue and brown stripe designs is absolute adorable.  It is a must have for those first baby photos or to have in your professional photography prop collection.

Care Instructions:

Handwash lay flat to dry.

Please allow two weeks for production if you need it in a rush please contact me at info@avagirldesigns.com

You can also check out other baby designs at www.avagirldesigns.com

name: Personalized wood baby hangers
description:
Personalized baby hanger is a precious heirloom hand crafted out of maple wood and hand stamped in archival ink - makes it the perfect display for baby's first outfit or to hang in the nursery as a decoration. Can be personalized with baby's name and or choice of pig or lamb.

* hanger is solid maple wood and measures 8.2" long
* one side fits up to 10 letters
* other side can be stamped with baby lamb or pig
* allow 2 weeks for delivery

Please allow two weeks for production if you need it in a rush please contact me at info@avagirldesigns.com


please leave note to seller during checkout baby's name and if you would like a pig, lamb or blank on opposite side

You can also check out other baby designs at www.avagirldesigns.com

name: Knitted baby Santa hat diaper cover and bootie set
description:
Santa baby hat bootie and diaper cover set knitted in very soft acrylic yarns will be absolutely adorable on your little own this holiday season. Perfect for those first meeting Santa photos or for any professional photographers prop collection.

Care Instructions:

Hand wash recommended cold lay flat to dry.

Hat Size Chart:

Newborns
13" - 14 "
33-36cm

Baby - 3 to 6 months
14" - 17 "
36-43 cm

Baby - 6 to 12 months
16" - 19 "
41-48 cm

Please allow 2 weeks for production if you need item in a rush please contact me at info@avagirldesigns.com

Feel free to check out a lot more baby designs at www.avagirldesigns.com

name: Knitted baby turkey hat and diaper cover set
description:
Knitted baby turkey diaper cover and hat set puts a little holiday goodness and smile on anyone face. At least this will be a little turkey that you will want to hug and kiss and not be on the center of the dining room table. This will be something that will be a family heirloom passed down from baby to baby to wear everything Thanksgiving. Professional photographers are you looking for something to add as a prop for Thanksgiving baby shoots well be the only photographer in your area with this little number mommy's and daddy's will love it!


________________________________________________________________________
Care Instructions:

Hand wash lay flat to dry.

name: knitted baby 4th of July hat and diaper cover set
description:
Your little one will be ready to celebrate this 4th of July in patriotic style in the All American Red, White, and Blue hat and diaper cover set.

Professional photographers this set will cover all those July babies the hat can also double as a Dr. Seuss prop so you can have two looks with this set! The diaper cover in dark blue with American stars and the hat is the traditional red and white stripes.


_______________________________________________________________________

Care Instructions:

Hand wash in cold lay flat to dry.
